sentences.translation: 篮球时，使姑娘们眼花缭乱。

sentences.sentence: He razzle-dazzled girls in basket ball.
sentences.translation: 他打篮球时，使姑娘们眼花缭乱。

sentences.sentence: He returned to Broadway almost three decades later, filling in as the razzle-dazzle lawyer Billy Flynn in "Chicago" in 2003.
sentences.translation: 近30年后他重返百老汇，在2003年的《芝加哥》中扮演了绝无人性的律师Billy Flynn。
